title: What are the benefits of chanting Lalitha Sahasranamam everyday? - Quora

response.answer_text: Lalitadevi is a form of Goddess Durga. One thousand names of Lalitadevi are known as Lalitha Sahasranamavali. The amazing and miraculous benefits of this stotra mentioned in the Brahmanda Purana are told. It has been said about this that by taking the name of Lord Shiva once, one gets the fruit of taking one thousand names of Lord Vishnu. Similarly, once taking the name of Lalita Devi, you get the result of taking one thousand names of Lord Shiva. It can be recited at any time during the day, but it is considered best to do it between 4 am and 7 am and in the evening. If you also want to achieve something big in your life, then definitely know about the benefits given under Lalita Sahasranama. If a person has a fever, reciting the Lalitha Sahastranamavali with a hand on his head, the fever immediately subsides. The more often it is used for the patient, the greater and quicker the benefit is. Vibhuti used for Lalita Sahasranamavali Archana is also applied on the forehead of the patient and provides relief in fever and headache. The regular atmosphere of Lalita Sahasranamavali purifies the atmosphere of the house. Even every particle of the reciting person's body is filled with amazing energy and energy. The person does not feel tired throughout the day. There is no fear of enemies by reciting Lalita Sahasranamavali. No enemy can harm a reader. Recitation of Lalitha Sahasranamavali achieves speech accomplishment. The person gains fame and his name shines like stars all around. Financial problems are eliminated by reciting it on Friday. One does not have to bother for the basic needs of life. While reciting Lalitha Sahasranamavali, keep a glass of water in front of you. After the end of the lesson, by sprinkling this water on your head, one gets relief from the troubles caused by the bad state of the planets. This eliminates all types of eye defects and black magic. While reciting Lalita Lalita Sahasranamavali, imagine the idol of Goddess Lalita sitting in the sea of ​​nectar in your mind. It gives freedom to all kinds of diseases. While reciting Lalitha Sahasranamavali for the attainment of children, keep a little pure ghee in front of you. After finishing the lesson eat this ghee. It removes impotence and leads to good progeny. Those who are having trouble having children, they should do this experiment.

Phalashruti or benefits follow but before that few useful tips… 1. If you want full benefit…take bath in the morning, finish the oblations of the dawn, go to the prayer room and first worship the Sri Chakra, chant the Sri Vidya mantra either 100 times or 400 times, and then the thousand names should be read. 2. Worshipping the Sri Chakra using the thousand names, with lotus, leaves of Tulasi, Kalharraa, kadamba flowers, Jasmine, Champak, Kara veera, Uthpala leaves of Bilwa, Jasmine buds and Kesara flowers, and other scented flowers like lotus, Kethaki Madavee Mukha is beneficial 3. If you can’t read daily, chant it on special occasions: Viz first of every month, first of the new year and the three birthdays (self, wife, son), On Navami or on Chathurdashi or Fridays of the waxing moon, and on the full moon day (facing moon for long life, disease) 4. Dedicate these thousand names to Brahmins, feeding them with sweet Payasam, Vada made out of black gram, and tasty meal of six rasas 5. If you can’t chant all names, chant ten important names out of these thousand names, Ganga, Gayatri, Syamala, Lakshmi, Kali, Bala, Lalita, Rajarajeswari, Saraswati and Bhavani Here are the benefits 1. Cures all diseases (touch ashes from any Devi temple while chanting and apply), all fevers (touch head while chanting), immunity againsdt accidental and untimely death, gives rise to long life 2. Gives all types of wealth 3. Gives child, especially son (offer butter and chant) 4. The devotee gets the effect of taking bath in sacred rivers like Ganga, the effect of consecrating one crore lingas, crore times merit of giving in Kurukshetra on Sundays, crore times punya of donating gold ornaments to the twice born who has learned Vedas, crore times merit of Ashwa medha yagas in the shores of the Ganges, digging one crore wells with water in the deserts, feeding one crore Brahmins daily during the famine, training one thousand children with care 5. All pleasures of life. 6. Immunity against the sin caused by very bad act of not doing the daily sacred routines, removes all problems created by planets (take water in a pot, chant and put drops on the self after completing), effect of poison will vanish(contemplate on Lakshmi and Lalitambika while chanting), enemies destroyed, eliminates cruelty and black magic 7. Win the favours of king (face the palace and chant), saints; permanent abode of Lakshmi (chant daily for six months), Saraswati on tongue (chant for a month) 8. Siddhi in Sri Vidya Upasana 9. Salvation if chanted without desires
